sect2.title: Re-installation of shadow to utilize PAM
Installation of shadow
sect2.para: Download the patch for shadow from .
Reinstall shadow by running the following commands:

userinput.command: patch -Np1 -i ../shadow-4.0.3-pam-2.patch && ./configure --prefix=/usr --libdir=/usr/lib \ --enable-shared --with-libpam && make && make install && ln -sf vipw /usr/sbin/vigr && rm /bin/vipw && mv /bin/sg /usr/bin && mv /usr/lib/lib{misc,shadow}.so.0* /lib && ln -sf ../../lib/libshadow.so.0 /usr/lib/libshadow.so && ln -sf ../../lib/libmisc.so.0 /usr/lib/libmisc.so && cp debian/securetty /etc/securetty
